situation.title: Dancing classes
situation.meta_description: Dance competitions and the teaching of dance (dance classes) are prohibited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

This year we will have to do without dancing classes. Since the service of dance studios and indoor sports grounds is prohibited, it is not possible to teach dance (on a professional level or traditional "dance classes"). The ban also applies to dance competitions that have been lifted this year.

questions_answers.question: Are there going to be any dance classes this year?
I am a professional dancer. Can I attend training or competitions?
